name: Bird
content: Look like like an angel flew away
你就像天使那样飞走了
I can I can hear you flew away
我能听到你飞走时的声音
Take now in your blue wing flew away
张开你那湛蓝的翅膀 飞走了
And go in the moon light flew away
飞进月光里 飞走了
Take now in your blue wing flew away
张开你那湛蓝的翅膀 飞走了
And go in the moon light flew away
飞进月光里 飞走了
